basics.name: Rylee Au
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Data Science at the United States Air Force Academy. I am currently on a Fall 2024 Semester Exchange at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring 2026.

education.institution: United States Air Force Academy, Colorado Springs, CO

work.summary: United States Air Force Academy Cadet
highlights: Attend the Academy, excelling in academics, athletics, and military tasks
Squadron Teal Rope: assist survivors of sexual assault and direct them to resources

work.position: 3D Printer Program Creator and Student Mentor
highlights: Creator, coordinator, and mentor of the NexTech Hawaii 3D Printer Program over more than 100 hours
3D Printed more than 300 pieces of personal protective equipment for first responders
STEM Camp student mentor and Zoom manager for over 65 hours
Performed exploratory testing to identify and report defects
Collaborated with faculty members to develop innovative strategies for teaching work skills to special education students

volunteer.summary: TESSA supports victims of abuse through immediate safehouse measures, counseling and therapy, and outreach
highlights: Cleaned up, filed, and organized the TESSA building to support workers who assist victims of abuse

awards.title: First Place Best Engineering Notebook
awards.summary: I entered the NexTech Hawaii Fish Tank design competition. I won the best engineering notebook and my team won 3rd place design

awards.title: Peter Chi Memorial Award
awards.summary: I received this award through my Swimming and Diving high school team for having the highest GPA

awards.title: NCWIT Aspirations in Computing Affiliate Honorable Award
awards.summary: I submitted my NexTech Hawaii 3D Printing Program initiative and earned this award
